description: Allows the user to create vibrations and quakes at will, making them a Tremor Human. Considered the strongest Paramecia-type Devil Fruit with the power to destroy the world.

users.circumstances: Whitebeard consumed the fruit at an unknown time in the past

abilityReveals.description: User creates massive quakes and shockwaves through the air itself by punching the atmosphere.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Whitebeard demonstrates his power at the start of the Marineford War.

abilityReveals.description: User creates enormous tsunamis by causing earthquakes in the ocean, capable of destroying entire islands.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Whitebeard creates twin tsunamis to attack Marineford from both sides.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can destroy the world - strongest Paramecia
strengths.description: The Gura Gura no Mi is stated to have the power to destroy the entire world.

strengths.strength: Can create earthquakes, tsunamis, and shockwaves
strengths.description: User has complete control over vibrations and quakes.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will, making them a Fire Human.

users.circumstances: Ace consumed the fruit before forming the Spade Pirates

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice at will, making them an Ice Human.

users.circumstances: Aokiji consumed the fruit at an unknown time before becoming an Admiral

abilityReveals.description: User can freeze enormous bodies of water instantly, including giant tsunamis.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Aokiji freezes both of Whitebeard's massive tsunamis to protect Marineford.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can freeze massive amounts of water instantly
strengths.description: User can freeze entire tsunamis in seconds.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into darkness at will, making them a Darkness Human. Has the unique ability to nullify other Devil Fruit powers.

users.circumstances: Blackbeard murdered Thatch to steal this Devil Fruit

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
